SELECT a.cameraId from ( SELECT con.value,tmp.ip,tmp.cameraId from tbl_ipc_ip_tmp tmp LEFT JOIN tbl_dossier_content con on tmp.cameraId = con.value and con.type_id in (#{id},#{id1}) ) a WHERE a.value is null
and a.cameraId like '%${cameraId}%'

SELECT a.cameraId from ( SELECT con.value,tmp.ip,tmp.cameraId from tbl_ipc_ip_tmp tmp LEFT JOIN tbl_dossier_content con on tmp.cameraId = con.value and con.type_id in (#{id},#{id1}) ) a INNER JOIN tbl_user as b INNER JOIN tbl_user_ipc_resource as c WHERE b.userId = c.user_id AND b.user_name= #{userName} AND a.ip = c.ip and a.value is null
and a.cameraId like '%${cameraId}%'
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO tbl_ipc_extra a USING ( SELECT COUNT(*) num FROM tbl_ipc_extra WHERE cameraType = #{cameraInformationVo.cameraType} AND cameraSn = #{cameraInformationVo.cameraSn} ) b ON (b.num>0) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET a.cameraValue = #{cameraInformationVo.cameraValue},a.modifyTime = #{cameraInformationVo.updateTime} where cameraType = #{cameraInformationVo.cameraType} AND cameraSn = #{cameraInformationVo.cameraSn} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( a.cameraType, a.cameraValue, a.isUse, a.cameraSn, a.addTime, a.modifyTime ) VALUES ( #{cameraInformationVo.cameraType}, #{cameraInformationVo.cameraValue}, #{cameraInformationVo.isUse}, #{cameraInformationVo.cameraSn}, #{cameraInformationVo.createTime}, #{cameraInformationVo.updateTime} )
mapper.select: select count(camera_sn) from tbl_ipc_ip_tmp where camera_sn = #{cameraSn}
